pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac

Class SignIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac.GacModule
      • pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac.SignIn

  • public class SignIn
extends GacModule
    Interface to the Google Sign In API, which can be used to determine the users identity. The default scopes "profile" and "email" are used to return basic information about the user (when possible) however this does not grant any authorization to use other Google APIs on behalf of the user. For more information visit: https://developers.google.com/identity/sign-in/android/

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SignIn.SignInListener
      Listener to be notified of asynchronous Sign In events, like sign in or sign out,

      • createSignInButton

        public SignInButton createSignInButton(Context context,
                              ViewGroup container)
        Add a SignInButton to the current Activity/Fragment. When clicked, the button will automatically make a call to signIn().
        Parameters:
        context - the calling context.
        container - a ViewGroup into which the SignInButton should be placed as the first child.
        Returns:
        the instantiated SignInButton, which can be customized further.

      • signIn

        public void signIn()
        Initiate the sign in process, resolving all possible errors (showing account picker, consent screen, etc). This operation may result in UI being displayed, results are returned to the SignIn.SignInListener.

      • signOut

        public void signOut()
        Initiate the sign out and disconnect process. Results are returned to the SignIn.SignInListener. If the user is not already signed in or the sign out operation fails, no result will be returned.

      • setListener

        public void setListener(SignIn.SignInListener listener)
